page.title: 12Strensall Children's Clubs
page.content: About 120 7-11 year old children in the primary school were asked what 'out of school' clubs and organisations they belonged to. { {Girls:}Brownies 19, Swimming Club 5, Piano lessons 4, Dancing class 4, Youth Club 4, Horse riding 2, Golf 1, Disco Club 1. {Boys:}Cubs 9, Football Club 9, Beavers 8, Youth Club 6, Swimming Club 4, Chess Club 2, Fishing 1, Scouts 1, Golf 1, Bell-ringing 1. All activities apart from chess and swimming are available in the village. Many children participate in club activities organised by the{teachers in the school during{lunch-times}and {after normal school hours.} Activities offered at different times of the year include guitar, recorder, country dancing, netball, athletics, gymnastics, cricket, football, chess and cycling proficiency.
